news.title: Bon Iver’s fABLE Salmon Is Now an Official Pantone Color
news.summary: The new name for Pantone 1625 CP, the pinkish hue on the cover of SABLE, fABLE

news.title: Fugees’ Pras Michel Sentenced to 14 Years in Prison on Conspiracy Charges
news.summary: The rapper was found guilty of criminal conspiracy and illegal foreign lobbying in 2023

news.title: Watch Geese Play Getting Killed Songs on Nigel Godrich’s From the Basement
news.summary: Cameron Winter and his band are the first act to play the iconic live-in-studio music series in nearly three years
